greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of lim_{k->oo} f(k), where f(1)=e, and f(k) = e + log(f(k-1)) for k>1.
comment: Let g(x) be the greater of the two solutions of s + log(s) = x; then A226572 represents g(e). [See however the comments in A226571. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 09 2017]
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) default(realprecision, 100); solve(x=4, 5, x - log(x) - exp(1)) \\ _Jianing Song_, Dec 24 2018
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 12 2013
ext: Definition revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 09 2017
